data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Larix sibirica (Siberian larch) from sample KHADYTLA-201

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Alluvium, Sand, Tree line -70 m, av. Tree height 15 m, Tree cover 15%, Shrub cover 80%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Lockerer Lä/Fi-Wald, Moos, Sträucher, Film number: 878A
